name: Gladiator Beast Gistel
text: At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card battled: You can shuffle this card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Gistel". You can only use each of the following effects of "Gladiator Beast Gistel" once per turn. You can reveal this card and 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster in your hand; Special Summon both. If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster: You can add 1 "Gladiator" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
